All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.faces.component.NamingContainer, javax.faces.component.StateHolder
public class Portlet
extends javax.faces.component.UINamingContainer

The Portlet component is a naming container that is used to wrap any ICEfaces page fragment that is designed to be deployed as a portlet. Currently, it's main purpose is to provide the proper namespace to the portlet's component heirarchy by
